validate_email(email)¶

Checks if a email is already in the user database.

Parameters

email (string) – The email inputted by the user.

Raises

ValidationError – Email is already in user database.

validate_username(username)¶

Checks if a username is already in the user database.

Parameters

username (string) – The username inputted by the user.

Raises

ValidationError – Username is already in user database.

class app.models.Ingredients(**kwargs)¶

Bases: sqlalchemy.ext.declarative.api.Model

Contains the information on all our available ingredients.

string

category
get_id(category, name)¶

Returns the ingredient’s ID.

Parameters

  • category (string) – The ingredient’s category.

  • name (string) – The ingredient’s name.

Returns

If the ingredient is found, returns the ingredient ID from the database. Otherwise, returns None.

app.models.load_user(id)¶

Returns the user’s ID from the user database model.

id (int) – The user’s ID.

Returns

If the ID is found, returns the user information from the database. Otherwise, returns None.

app.routes module¶

app.routes.get_items(category)¶

Gets the ingredient information from the ingredients database

Returns

A list of ingredients from the ingredients database

app.routes.home()¶

Brings the user to the homepage.

Returns

The HTML for the homepage

app.routes.ingredients()¶

Brings the user to the virtual pantry web page.

Returns

The HTML for virtual web page.

app.routes.login()¶

Brings the user to the login web page.

Returns

The HTML for the login web page. If user is not found or password was incorrect, return login HTML. Otherwise, return home HTML.

app.routes.logout()¶

Logs the current user off.

Returns

The HTML for the homepage.

app.routes.recipes_search()¶

Brings the user to the recipes web page.

Returns

The HTML for recipes web page.

app.routes.register()¶

Brings the user to the register user web page.

Returns

The HTML for the register user web page. If the form was submitted successfully, returns the login HTML.

app.routes.remove_ingredient()¶

Brings the user to the remove ingredient web page.

Returns

The HTML for remove ingredient web page. When the user submits the form, returns virtual pantry HTML.

app.routes.stock_pantry()¶

Brings the user to the stock pantry web page.

Returns

The HTML for stock pantry web page. If the user adds an existing ingredient, returns stock pantry HTML. Otherwise, return virtual pantry HTML.

Module contents¶

app.create_tables()¶

Creates our database models first so the web application can see them.
